thread.section_title: Redspot Car Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redspot Car Rentals | redspot.com.au | 11 of 750
thread.title: KIRSTEN
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by KIRSTEN

author: KIRSTEN
title: KIRSTEN
text: Very easy company to deal with and very competitive in pricing. I even got upgraded in car size with a car that had only done approximately 4000km, all for the original price. We booked a baby car seat which was installed. However more training needs to be given to the installers as it was dangerously loose.
